item.title: RC-Journey
item.description: How to get started Do not start with a cool fighter jet - you will destroy it!!! Get something simple to fly Tiny indoor drone (with prop protection) Stabaliesed camera drone (with prop protection) A Trainer airplane (with recovery function or dihedral) Get a simulator and use it for some time Areas of the hobby Planes Glider (with or without motor) High wing (trainer / stol) Mid wing (3d) Low wing (warbirds) Wing Helicopters Scale 3D Drones Camera (typical DJI) Cinematic (mix off freestyle and camera) Freestyle / Racing FPV (First Person View) Race / Freestyle / Longrange / Mission Building your own Foamboard / Depron Balsawood Tech Challange Is this something you can image to get into?
